article_title: Hill's underdog bid for Senate overshadowed by governor's race
article_text:
Avon, IN (46123)

Today

Scattered thunderstorms during the morning becoming more widespread this afternoon. High around 80F. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 100%..

Tonight

Variably cloudy with scattered thunderstorms. Low 67F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

article_metadata.author: Maureen Hayden CNHI State Reporter

og.description: A five-term former congressman, Baron Hill has previously scored with voters who know him for an on-court reputation that saw him later inducted into the state Basketball Hall of Fame
